meals.name: Chorizo & mozzarella gnocchi bake
meals.description: Upgrade cheesy tomato pasta with gnocchi, chorizo and mozzarella for a comforting bake that makes an excellent midweek meal

meals.name: Butter chicken
meals.description: Fancy a healthy version of your favourite Friday night curry? Try our easy butter chicken

meals.name: Classic lasagne
meals.description: Kids will love this easiest ever pasta bake with streaky bacon, beef mince, a crème fraîche sauce and gooey mozzarella

meals.name: Teriyaki chicken
meals.description: Sticky Asian-style teriyaki chicken, Try it with sticky rice and steamed greens

meals.name: One-pan spaghetti with nduja, fennel & olives
meals.description: A spicy sausage pasta dish with a difference. Using the cooking water helps the sauce cling to the pasta and gives the dish more body

meals.name: Meatballs
meals.description: Meatballs on spaghetti with hidden vegetable tomato sauce

meals.name: Chicken curry
meals.description: This easy staple chicken curry is fantastic for family dinners. It's made with just a handful of ingredients and is enriched with creamy yogurt

meals.name: Treacle sponge
meals.description: A simple baked version of this classic childhood pudding, with a zesty treacle sauce forming an irresistible puddle at the bottom
